entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Kangiqsujuaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:07 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -19.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kangiqsujuaq Airport 10:00 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -19.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -23.1°C
Wind: N 45 km/h gust 57 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Blowing snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:14 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:14 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending in the morning then sunny. Blowing snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Local blowing snow late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:14 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
